name: OrganismsTestsByMicroscopicObservationByUnspecifiedAcidFastStain
title: Organisms (Tests by Microscopic Observation by Unspecified Acid Fast Stain)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of organisms by unspecified acid fast stain.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Microscopic observation by unspecified acid fast stain),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
